summary: This mod adds a new spell to the game, Lightning Storm and Soul Trap in one!
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]This mod adds a simple spell I made for my current play through, it is Lightning Storm and Soul Trap in one spell.
[/size][size=3]You can find the Spell Tome in the Arcanaeum, see images for the exact location.
This is a Master Destruction spell that should be usefull for high level Mages.

My other mods:
Nazeem Spells: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61993/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61993/?[/url]
Whiterun Dragon: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36420/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36420/?[/url]
Soul Burn: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66099/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66099/?[/url][/size]
author: spinerex
